name: Novice
description: Has absolutely no experience with the skill and is starting from scratch.

name: Beginner
description: Has basic understanding and can perform simple tasks with guidance.

name: Intermediate
description: Has a solid grap of the fundamentals and can work independently on moderately complex tasks.

name: Advanced
description: Possesses in-depth knowledge and can handle complex problems, often guiding others.

name: Expert
description: Master of the skill, capable of innovation, problem-solving, and teaching at the highest level.

name: Grandmaster
description: The ultimate authority in the skill, defines the best practices and pushes boundaries
